item.title: By: Dinesh
item.dc:creator: Dinesh
item.description: Thanks for sharing some excellent gaming laptops here. But everyone can't buy these type of laptop for the high budget. Do you have any core i5 Specifications laptop? If yes please share with us. Thank you Eugen!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing some excellent gaming laptops here. But everyone can’t buy these type of laptop for the high budget. Do you have any core i5 Specifications laptop? If yes please share with us. Thank you Eugen!
